mapper.select:
select count(j.id) from JOB j, RESUMEDELIVER rd, RESUME r, USER u where j.id = rd.jobId and rd.resumeId = r.id and r.userId = u.id and j.id=#{jobId} and u.userType=0
and status = #{status}
mapper.insert: insert into RESUMEDELIVER (createTime, jobId, resumeId, status) values(#{createTime}, #{jobId},#{resumeId},#{status})
mapper.update: update RESUMEDELIVER set status = #{status} where jobId = #{jobId} and resumeId = #{resumeId}
mapper.select: select * from RESUMEDELIVER rd where rd.jobId = #{jobId}
